title: Morytania Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Morytania Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas within and around Morytania, such as Paterdomus, Harmony Island and Mos Le'Harmless. Completion of Priest in Peril is required for all tasks, as it is needed to enter Morytania.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Morytania achievements
For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.
Morytania Diary
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Area(s) Morytania, Paterdomus, Harmony Island and Mos Le'Harmless
Members Yes
Item reward Platelegs
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Le-sabrè
Levels required
Total level: 1117
 ----  ----  55
 76  71  50

20 ----

The Morytania Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas within and around Morytania, such as Paterdomus, Harmony Island and Mos Le'Harmless. Completion of Priest in Peril is required for all tasks, as it is needed to enter Morytania.

Le-sabrè's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from Le-sabrè just west of Canifis. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from Le-sabrè. She is located just to the west of Canifis.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
12
15
15
23[3]
 
20
84+
Quest Requirements
Nature Spirit
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ 47 for ironmen

Rewards

  • Morytania legs 1
    • 2 daily teleports to the Slime Pit beneath the Ectofuntus
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • 50% chance of a ghast ignoring you rather than attacking
  • 2.5% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Skill Requirements[1][2]
42
50

45
42

335+
Quest Requirements
Cabin Fever
Dwarf Cannon
Ghosts Ahoy
Lair of Tarn Razorlor
Additional Requirements
Started In Aid of the Myreque
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Morytania legs 2
    • 5 daily teleports to the Slime Pit beneath the Ectofuntus
    • Acts as a ghostspeak amulet when worn
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Robin offers 13 buckets of slime and 13 pots of bonemeal in exchange for bones each day
  • 5% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Skill Requirements[1][2]
55

Started The Great Brain Robbery
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Morytania legs 3
    • Unlimited teleports to Burgh de Rott
  • Bonecrusher
    • An additional item that, when carried, causes bones dropped from killed monsters to be automatically buried, granting half the Prayer experience that would have been granted for burying them normally; charged with a small amount of ecto-tokens
    • It can be claimed from a ghost disciple
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Robin offers 26 free buckets of slime and 26 pots of bonemeal in exchange for bones each day
  • Double Mort myre fungi when casting Bloom
  • 50% more Prayer experience from burning shade remains
  • Access to a shortcut across the estuary on Mos Le'Harmless
  • 50% more runes from the Barrows chest
  • 7.5% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Skill Requirements[1][2]

In Aid of the Myreque
Lunar Diplomacy
Shades of Mort'ton
Additional Requirements
Completed Barbarian Training in Fishing
Loot barrows chest while wearing any complete Barrows set
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ 70 if wearing Ahrim's, Dharok's, Guthan's, Torag's or Verac's.
  4. ^ 70 if wearing Karil's.

Rewards

  • Morytania legs 4
    • Unlimited teleports to the slime pit beneath the Ectofuntus
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Robin offers 39 free buckets of slime and 39 pots of bonemeal in exchange for bones each day
  • 50% more Firemaking experience when burning shade remains
  • Bones buried from the Bonecrusher grant full Prayer experience
  • Access to the herb patch on Harmony Island
  • 10% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Easy[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Chisel
  • Ghostspeak amulet
  • Earmuffs
  • Any blamish snail shell (cannot use Snail shell)
  • Thin snail
  • 2 Ecto-tokens (0 if Ghosts Ahoy completed) or up to 5200 Coins for Charter ship needed to enter Port Phasmatys.
  • Any tannable hide + Coins: cowhide or green - black dragonhide (not a Suqah hide)
  • Scarecrow
  • Bonemeal
  • Bucket of slime
  • Wolfbane
Skills Needed
  • 12 Cooking
  • 15 Crafting
  • 20 Combat level
  • 23 Farming (47 if Ironman to grow a watermelon for the scarecrow)
  • 15 Slayer
Quests required
  • Priest in Peril
  • Nature Spirit
    • The Restless Ghost
Task Requirements
1. Craft any snelm from scratch in Morytania.
  • 15 Crafting
  • Chisel and any blamish shell
2. Cook a thin snail on the Port Phasmatys range.
  • 12 Cooking
  • Thin snail
  • 2 Ecto-tokens (0 if Ghosts Ahoy completed) or up to 5200 Coins for Charter ship needed to enter Port Phasmatys.
  • Tip: Smelt a set of cannonballs there to complete a medium task
3. Get a Slayer task from Mazchna.
  • 20 Combat level
4. Kill a banshee in the Slayer Tower.
  • 15 Slayer
  • Earmuffs or a Slayer helmet are highly recommended
5. Have Sbott tan something for you.
  • Any tannable hide and 2-45 coins depending on the type of hide
6. Enter Mort Myre Swamp.
  • Partial completion of Nature Spirit
7. Kill a ghoul.
  • Weaponry
8. Place a Scarecrow in the Morytania flower patch.

Note: The flower patch is west of Port Phasmatys.

  • 23 Farming
  • Scarecrow (made with a bronze spear, watermelon and hay sack)
9. Offer some Bonemeal at the Ectofuntus.
  • Pot, bucket and any bones
10. Kill a Werewolf in its human form using the Wolfbane dagger.
  • Wolfbane dagger (reward from Priest in Peril)
11. Restore your prayer points at the Nature Grotto.
  • Completion of Nature Spirit
  • Tip: Activate Piety while praying to complete a hard task


Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Morytania legs 1
    • 2 daily teleports to the Slime Pit beneath the Ectofuntus
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • 50% chance of a ghast ignoring you rather than attacking
  • 2.5% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • At least 1 rope and small fishing net
  • Any axe
  • 25 ecto-tokens (10 with a ring of charos)
  • Ghostspeak amulet
  • Weapon and armour
  • Another player on opposing team to help you start Trouble Brewing
  • Steel bar
  • Ammo mould
  • Slayer gloves (if within melee distance) (not needed if already done Cabin Fever, which is required anyway)
  • Ectophial
  • Restore potion
  • Garlic
  • Silver dust
Skills Needed
  • 42 Agility
  • 40 Cooking
  • 50 Fishing[?]
  • 22 Herblore
  • 29 Hunter
  • 42 Slayer
  • 50 Smithing[?]
  • 45 Woodcutting
Quests required
  • Dwarf Cannon
  • Ghosts Ahoy
    • The Restless Ghost
    • Priest in Peril
  • Lair of Tarn Razorlor miniquest
    • Haunted Mine
  • Cabin Fever
    • Pirate's Treasure
    • Rum Deal
      • Zogre Flesh Eaters
        • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
        • Jungle Potion
          • Druidic Ritual
  • Started In Aid of the Myreque
    • In Search of the Myreque
      • Nature Spirit
Task Requirements
1. Catch a swamp lizard.
  • 29 Hunter
  • Rope and small fishing net
2. Complete a lap of the Canifis Rooftop Agility Course.
  • 40 Agility
3. Obtain some bark from a Hollow tree.
  • 45 Woodcutting
  • Any axe
4. Travel to Dragontooth Isle.

Note: Visited during Ghosts Ahoy.

  • Ghostspeak amulet and 25 ecto-tokens (or 10 with the ring of charos (a))
5. Kill a Terror Dog.
  • Completion of the Haunted Mine and Lair of Tarn Razorlor
  • 40 Slayer(not boostable)
  • Combat gear
  • Recommended: Slayer ring to teleport nearby
6. Complete a game of trouble brewing.

Note: Winning is optional.

  • Completion of Cabin Fever
  • 40 Cooking
  • Players require an empty inventory and helm slot. At least one opposing player is required to start the game.
7. Board the Swamp boaty at the Hollows

Note: There is a nearby fairy ring (bkr).

  • Completion of Nature Spirit
8. Make a batch of cannonballs at the Port Phasmatys furnace.
  • Completion of Dwarf Cannon
  • 35 Smithing
  • Steel bar and ammo mould
9. Kill a fever spider on Braindeath Island.

Note: Achieved during Rum Deal.

  • Started Rum Deal
  • 42 Slayer
  • Slayer gloves are recommended to prevent disease
10. Use an ectophial to return to Port Phasmatys.
  • Completion of Ghosts Ahoy
  • Ectophial
11. Mix a Guthix balance potion while in Morytania.
  • Partial completion of In Aid of the Myreque
  • 22 Herblore
  • Restore potion, garlic and silver dust (made by using a silver bar on the Ectofuntus bone grinder)

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Morytania legs 2
    • 5 daily teleports to the Slime Pit beneath the Ectofuntus
    • Acts as a ghostspeak amulet when worn
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Robin offers 13 buckets of slime and 13 pots of bonemeal in exchange for bones each day
  • 5% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 3 teak planks
  • 100,000 coins if you haven't already built a portal chamber.
  • 2 limestone bricks if you haven't already built a teleport focus
  • 200 law runes
  • 100 blood runes
  • 3 watermelon seeds
  • Any axe
  • Tinderbox
  • Decent weapon and armour
  • Witchwood icon
  • Light source
  • Mushroom spore
  • Pickaxe
  • Crystal-mine key
  • Hammer
  • Saw
  • Farming supplies
Skills Needed
  • 71 Agility (boostable)
  • 50 Construction
  • 70 Defence
  • 53 Farming (boostable)
  • 50 Firemaking
  • 66 Magic
  • 55 Mining (boostable)
  • 70 Prayer
  • 58 Slayer
  • 50 Woodcutting
  • 50 Smithing[?]
  • 53 Thieving (not boostable)
Quests required
  • Haunted Mine
    • Priest in Peril
  • Desert Treasure
    • Temple of Ikov
    • The Tourist Trap
    • Waterfall Quest
    • The Dig Site
      • Druidic Ritual
    • Troll Stronghold
      • Death Plateau
  • Started The Great Brain Robbery
    • Creature of Fenkenstrain
    • Cabin Fever
      • Pirate's Treasure
      • Priest in Peril
      • Rum Deal
        • Zogre Flesh Eaters
          • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
    • Freeing Pirate Pete subquest of Recipe for Disaster
      • Cook's Assistant
  • In Aid of the Myreque
    • In Search of the Myreque
      • Nature Spirit
        • The Restless Ghost
  • Knight Waves Training Grounds
    • King's Ransom
      • Black Knights' Fortress
      • Murder Mystery
      • Holy Grail
        • Merlin's Crystal
      • One Small Favour
        • Rune Mysteries
        • Shilo Village
Task Requirements
1. Enter the Kharyrll portal in your POH.

Note: Either a Portal chamber or Portal nexus works.

  • Completion of Desert Treasure
  • 66 Magic
  • To construct the portal chamber: 50 Construction, 100,000 coins, 2 limestone bricks, 3 teak planks, a hammer and saw
  • To charge the portal: 200 law runes and 100 blood runes (you do not need to equip the ancient spellbook)
  • Alternatively, the more expensive Portal nexus can be used
2. Climb the advanced spike chain within Slayer Tower.
  • 71 Agility
  • If using the southern spike chain shortcut to aberrant spectres, a nose peg/Slayer helmet is required to prevent them draining agility. A longer, safer route can be taken without aggressive monsters that require special equipment.
3. Harvest some Watermelon from the allotment patch on Harmony Island.
  • Started The Great Brain Robbery
  • 47 Farming
  • 3 watermelon seeds, rake and seed dibber
  • Ultracompost is recommended
4. Chop and burn some mahogany logs on Mos Le'Harmless.
  • Completion of Cabin Fever
  • 50 Woodcutting and 50 Firemaking
  • Any axe and tinderbox
5. Complete a temple trek with a hard companion.
  • Completion of In Aid of the Myreque
  • Combat gear
  • Recommended: Completion of Darkness of Hallowvale to unlock the reverse route
6. Kill a Cave Horror.
  • Completion of Cabin Fever
  • 58 Slayer
  • Witchwood icon and a light source
7. Harvest some Bittercap Mushrooms from the patch in Canifis.
  • 53 Farming
  • Mushroom spore, rake and seed dibber
  • Ultracompost is recommended
8. Pray at the Altar of Nature with Piety activated.

Note: The Altar of Nature is in the Nature Grotto.

  • Completion of Nature Spirit and the Knight Waves Training Grounds
  • 70 Prayer(not boostable) and 70 Defence(not boostable)
9. Use the shortcut to get to the bridge over the Salve. Note: Only counts when going downwards.
  • 65 Agility
10. Mine some mithril ore in the Abandoned Mine.
  • Completion of Haunted Mine
  • 55 Mining
  • Any pickaxe

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Morytania legs 3
    • Unlimited teleports to Burgh de Rott
  • Bonecrusher
    • An additional item that, when carried, causes bones dropped from killed monsters to be automatically buried, granting half the Prayer experience that would have been granted for burying them normally; charged with a small amount of ecto-tokens
    • It can be claimed from a ghost disciple
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Robin offers 26 free buckets of slime and 26 pots of bonemeal in exchange for bones each day
  • Double Mort myre fungi when casting Bloom
  • 50% more Prayer experience from burning shade remains
  • Access to a shortcut across the estuary on Mos Le'Harmless
  • 50% more runes from the Barrows chest
  • 7.5% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Magic pyre logs
  • Shade remains
  • Tinderbox
  • 2 nature runes
  • 3 astral runes
  • 15 earth runes
  • 3 black dragon leather
  • Needle
  • Thread
  • Combat equipment
  • Any full Barrows equipment set
Skills Needed
  • 70 Attack
  • 84 Crafting(boostable)
  • 70 Defence
  • 80 Firemaking(boostable)
  • 96 Fishing(boostable)
  • 83 Magic (boostable)
  • 70 Ranged
  • 85 Slayer (boostable)
  • 76 Strength
Quests required
  • Barbarian Fishing
  • Shades of Mort'ton
    • Priest in Peril
  • In Aid of the Myreque
    • In Search of the Myreque
      • Nature Spirit
        • The Restless Ghost
  • Lunar Diplomacy
    • The Fremennik Trials
    • Lost City
    • Rune Mysteries
    • Shilo Village
      • Jungle Potion
        • Druidic Ritual
Task Requirements
1. Catch a shark in Burgh de Rott with your bare hands.
  • Completion of In Aid of the Myreque
  • Access to Barbarian Fishing
  • 96 Fishing and 76 Strength
2. Cremate any Shade remains on a Magic or Redwood pyre.
  • Completion of Shades of Mort'ton
  • 80 Firemaking
  • Magic pyre logs, any shade remains and a tinderbox
3. Fertilize the Morytania herb patch using Lunar Magic.

Note: The herb patch is west of Port Phasmatys.

  • Completion of Lunar Diplomacy
  • 83 Magic and means to cast Fertile Soil ( 15 3 2 )
4. Craft a Black dragonhide body in the Canifis bank.
  • 84 Crafting
  • 3 black dragon leather, needle and thread
5. Kill an Abyssal demon in the Slayer Tower.
  • 85 Slayer
  • Combat gear
6. Loot the Barrows chest while wearing any complete barrows set.

Note: Requires equipping the weapon as well.

  • 70 Defence
  • Various more skill requirements depending on the set used:
    • 70 Attack and 70 Magic for Ahrim's
    • 70 Attack and 70 Strength for Dharok's or Torag's
    • 70 Attack for Guthan's or Verac's
    • 70 Ranged for Karil's

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Morytania legs 4
    • Unlimited teleports to the slime pit beneath the Ectofuntus
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Robin offers 39 free buckets of slime and 39 pots of bonemeal in exchange for bones each day
  • 50% more Firemaking experience when burning shade remains
  • Bones buried via the Bonecrusher grant full Prayer experience
  • Access to the herb patch on Harmony Island
  • 10% more Slayer experience in the Slayer Tower while on a Slayer task

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 September 2015
(update)

Typo in Morytania Diary journal fixed.

17 September 2015
(update)

The task to make a Guthix balance potion in Morytania will now tick off if you are anywhere in Morytania, not just at ground level.

16 July 2015
(update)

Fixed misspelling of "receive" in Ardougne, Karamja, Morytania and Wilderness Diaries.

7 May 2015
(update)

Climbing the medium spiked chain at the slayer tower no longer completes the Morytania task for climbing the advanced spike chain.

9 April 2015
(update)

Fixed typos in the Morytania achievement diary.

style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Chisel]] *[[Ghostspeak amulet]] *[[Earmuffs]] *Any blamish snail shell (cannot use [[Snail shell]]) *[[Thin snail]] *2 [[Ecto-tokens]] (0 if [[Ghosts Ahoy]] completed) or up to 5200 [[Coins]] for [[Charter ship]] needed to enter [[Port Phasmatys]]. *Any tannable [[hide]] + Coins: [[cowhide]] or green - black [[dragonhide]] ('''not''' a [[Suqah hide]]) *[[Scarecrow]] *[[Bonemeal]] *[[Bucket of slime]] *[[Wolfbane dagger|Wolfbane]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Craft any [[snelm]] from scratch in [[Morytania]]. | *{{SCP|Crafting|15|link=y}} *[[Chisel]] and any [[blamish shell]] |- |2. Cook a [[thin snail]] on the [[Port Phasmatys]] range. | *{{SCP|Cooking|12|link=y}} *[[Thin snail]] *2 [[Ecto-tokens]] (0 if [[Ghosts Ahoy]] completed) or up to 5200 [[Coins]] for [[Charter ship]] needed to enter [[Port Phasmatys]]. *'''''Tip:''' Smelt a set of [[cannonball]]s there to complete a medium task'' |- |3. Get a [[Slayer task]] from [[Mazchna]]. | *{{SCP|Combat|20|link=y}} |- |4. Kill a [[banshee]] in the [[Slayer Tower]]. | *{{SCP|Slayer|15|link=y}} *''[[Earmuffs]] or a [[Slayer helmet]] are highly recommended'' |- |5. Have [[Sbott]] tan something for you. | *Any tannable [[hide]] and 2-45 [[coins]] depending on the type of hide |- |6. Enter [[Mort Myre Swamp]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Nature Spirit]] |- |7. Kill a [[ghoul]]. | *[[Weaponry]] |- |8. Place a [[Scarecrow]] in the [[Morytania]] [[Flower (patch)|flower patch]]. ''Note: The flower patch is west of [[Port Phasmatys]].'' | *{{SCP|Farming|23|link=y}} *[[Scarecrow]] (made with a [[bronze spear]], [[watermelon]] and [[hay sack]]) |- |9. Offer some [[Bonemeal]] at the [[Ectofuntus]]. | *[[Pot]], [[bucket]] and any [[bones]] |- |10. Kill a [[Werewolf]] in its human form using the [[Wolfbane dagger]]. | *[[Wolfbane dagger]] (reward from [[Priest in Peril]]) |- |11. Restore your [[prayer points]] at the [[Nature Grotto]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Nature Spirit]] *'''''Tip:''' Activate [[Piety]] while praying to complete a hard task |} ===Rewards=== *[[Morytania legs 1]] **2 daily teleports to the Slime Pit beneath the [[Ectofuntus]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30 *50% chance of a [[ghast]] ignoring you rather than attacking *2.5% more [[Slayer]] experience in the [[Slayer Tower]] while on a [[Slayer task]] ==Medium== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *At least 1 [[rope]] and [[small fishing net]] *Any [[axe]] *25 [[ecto-token]]s (10 with a [[ring of charos]]) *[[Ghostspeak amulet]] *[[Weapon]] and [[armour]] *Another player on opposing team to help you start [[Trouble Brewing]] *[[Steel bar]] *[[Ammo mould]] *[[Slayer gloves]] (if within [[melee]] distance) (not needed if already done Cabin Fever, which is required anyway) *[[Ectophial]] *[[Restore potion]] *[[Garlic]] *[[Silver dust]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! Catch a [[Swamp lizard (Hunter)|swamp lizard]]. | *{{SCP|Hunter|29|link=y}} *[[Rope]] and [[small fishing net]] |- |2. Complete a lap of the [[Canifis Rooftop Course|Canifis Rooftop Agility Course]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|40|link=y}} |- |3. Obtain some [[bark]] from a [[Hollow tree]]. | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|45|link=y}} *Any [[axe]] |- |4. Travel to [[Dragontooth Island|Dragontooth Isle]]. ''Note: Visited during [[Ghosts Ahoy]].'' | *[[Ghostspeak amulet]] and 25 [[ecto-token]]s (or 10 with the [[ring of charos (a)]]) |- |5. Kill a [[terror dog|Terror Dog]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of the [[Haunted Mine]] and [[Lair of Tarn Razorlor]] *{{SCP|Slayer|40|link=y}}{{boostable|no}} *[[Combat gear]] *'''''Recommended:''' [[Slayer ring]] to teleport nearby |- |6. Complete a game of [[Trouble Brewing|trouble brewing]]. ''Note: Winning is optional.'' | *Completion of [[Cabin Fever]] *{{SCP|Cooking|40|link=y}} *Players require an empty inventory and helm slot. At least one opposing player is required to start the game. |- |7. Board the [[Swamp Boaty|Swamp boaty]] at the [[Hollows]] ''Note: There is a nearby [[fairy ring]] ({{Fairycode|bkr}}).'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Nature Spirit]] |- |8. Make a batch of [[cannonball]]s at the [[Port Phasmatys]] furnace. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Dwarf Cannon]] *{{SCP|Smithing|35|link=y}} *[[Steel bar]] and [[ammo mould]] |- |9. Kill a [[fever spider]] on [[Braindeath Island]]. ''Note: Achieved during [[Rum Deal]].'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Rum Deal]] *{{SCP|Slayer|42|link=y}} *''[[Slayer gloves]] are recommended to prevent [[disease]]'' |- |10. Use an [[ectophial]] to return to [[Port Phasmatys]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Ghosts Ahoy]] *[[Ectophial]] |- |11. Mix a [[Guthix balance]] potion while in [[Morytania]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[In Aid of the Myreque]] *{{SCP|Herblore|22|link=y}} *[[Restore potion]], [[garlic]] and [[silver dust]] (made by using a [[silver bar]] on the [[Ectofuntus]] [[bone grinder]]) |} ===Rewards=== *[[Morytania legs 2]] **5 daily teleports to the Slime Pit beneath the [[Ectofuntus]] **Acts as a [[ghostspeak amulet]] when worn *[[Antique lamp]] worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40 *[[Robin]] offers 13 [[buckets of slime]] and 13 pots of [[bonemeal]] in exchange for bones each day *5% more [[Slayer]] experience in the [[Slayer Tower]] while on a [[Slayer task]] ==Hard== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *3 [[teak plank]]s *100,000 coins if you haven't already built a portal chamber. *2 [[limestone brick]]s if you haven't already built a teleport focus *200 [[law rune]]s *100 [[blood rune]]s *3 [[watermelon seed]]s *Any [[axe]] *[[Tinderbox]] *Decent [[weapon]] and [[armour]] *[[Witchwood icon]] *[[Light source]] *[[Mushroom spore]] *[[Pickaxe]] *[[Crystal-mine key]] *[[Hammer]] *[[Saw]] *[[Farming]] supplies }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Enter the [[Kharyrll Teleport|Kharyrll portal]] in your [[POH]]. ''Note: Either a [[Portal chamber]] or [[Portal nexus]] works.'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Desert Treasure]] *{{SCP|Magic|66|link=y}} *To construct the [[portal chamber]]: {{SCP|Construction|50|link=y}}, 100,000 [[coins]], 2 [[limestone brick]]s, 3 [[teak plank]]s, a [[hammer]] and [[saw]] *To charge the portal: 200 [[law rune]]s and 100 [[blood rune]]s (you do not need to equip the [[Ancient Magicks|ancient spellbook]]) *Alternatively, the more expensive [[Portal Nexus|Portal nexus]] can be used |- |2. Climb the advanced spike chain within [[Slayer Tower]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|71|link=y}} *If using the southern spike chain shortcut to aberrant spectres, a [[nose peg]]/[[Slayer helmet]] is required to prevent them draining agility. A longer, safer route can be taken without aggressive monsters that require special equipment. |- |3. Harvest some [[Watermelon]] from the [[allotment patch]] on [[Harmony Island]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[The Great Brain Robbery]] *{{SCP|Farming|47|link=y}} *3 [[watermelon seed]]s, [[rake]] and [[seed dibber]] *''[[Ultracompost]] is recommended'' |- |4. Chop and burn some [[mahogany logs]] on [[Mos Le'Harmless]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Cabin Fever]] *{{SCP|Woodcutting|50|link=y}} and {{SCP|Firemaking|50|link=y}} *Any [[axe]] and [[tinderbox]] |- |5. Complete a [[Temple Trekking|temple trek]] with a hard companion. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[In Aid of the Myreque]] *[[Combat gear]] *'''''Recommended:''' Completion of [[Darkness of Hallowvale]] to unlock the reverse route'' |- |6. Kill a [[cave horror|Cave Horror]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Cabin Fever]] *{{SCP|Slayer|58|link=y}} *[[Witchwood icon]] and a [[light source]] |- |7. Harvest some [[Mushroom|Bittercap Mushrooms]] from the patch in [[Canifis]]. | *{{SCP|Farming|53|link=y}} *[[Mushroom spore]], [[rake]] and [[seed dibber]] *''[[Ultracompost]] is recommended'' |- |8. Pray at the [[Nature Grotto|Altar of Nature]] with [[Piety]] activated. ''Note: The Altar of Nature is in the [[Nature Grotto]].'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Nature Spirit]] and the [[Knight Waves Training Grounds]] *{{SCP|Prayer|70|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} and {{SCP|Defence|70|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} |- |9. Use the shortcut to get to the bridge over [[River Salve|the Salve]]. ''Note: Only counts when going downwards.'' | *{{SCP|Agility|65|link=y}} |- |10. Mine some [[mithril ore]] in the [[Abandoned Mine]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Haunted Mine]] *{{SCP|Mining|55|link=y}} *Any [[pickaxe]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Morytania legs 3]] **Unlimited teleports to [[Burgh de Rott]] *[[Bonecrusher]] **An additional item that, when carried, causes bones dropped from killed monsters to be automatically buried, granting half the [[Prayer]] experience that would have been granted for burying them normally; charged with a small amount of [[ecto-token]]s **It can be claimed from a [[ghost disciple]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50 *[[Robin]] offers 26 free [[buckets of slime]] and 26 pots of [[bonemeal]] in exchange for bones each day *Double [[Mort myre fungus|Mort myre fungi]] when casting [[Bloom]] *50% more [[Prayer]] experience from burning shade remains *Access to a shortcut across the estuary on [[Mos Le'Harmless]] *50% more [[runes]] from the [[Barrows chest]] *7.5% more [[Slayer]] experience in the [[Slayer Tower]] while on a [[Slayer task]] ==Elite== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Magic pyre logs]] *[[Shade remains]] *[[Tinderbox]] *2 [[nature rune]]s *3 [[astral rune]]s *15 [[earth rune]]s *3 [[black dragon leather]] *[[Needle]] *[[Thread]] *[[Combat equipment]] *Any full [[Barrows equipment]] set }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! Catch a [[shark]] in [[Burgh de Rott]] with your bare hands. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[In Aid of the Myreque]] *Access to [[Barbarian Fishing]] *{{SCP|Fishing|96|link=y}} and {{SCP|Strength|76|link=y}} |- |2. Cremate any [[Shade remains]] on a [[Magic pyre logs|Magic]] or [[Redwood pyre logs|Redwood pyre]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Shades of Mort'ton]] *{{SCP|Firemaking|80|link=y}} *[[Magic pyre logs]], any [[shade remains]] and a [[tinderbox]] |- |3. Fertilize the [[Morytania]] [[herb patch]] using [[Lunar spells|Lunar Magic]]. ''Note: The herb patch is west of [[Port Phasmatys]].'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] *{{SCP|Magic|83|link=y}} and means to cast [[Fertile Soil]] ({{RuneReq|Nature=2|Astral=3|Earth=15}}) |- |4. Craft a [[Black d'hide body|Black dragonhide body]] in the [[Canifis]] bank. | *{{SCP|Crafting|84|link=y}} *3 [[black dragon leather]], [[needle]] and [[thread]] |- |5. Kill an [[Abyssal demon]] in the [[Slayer Tower]]. | *{{SCP|Slayer|85|link=y}} *[[Combat gear]] |- |6. Loot the [[Barrows chest]] while wearing any complete [[Barrows equipment|barrows set]]. ''Note: Requires equipping the weapon as well.'' | *{{SCP|Defence|70|link=y}} *Various more skill requirements depending on the set used: **{{SCP|Attack|70|link=y}} and {{SCP|Magic|70|link=y}} for [[Ahrim the Blighted's equipment|Ahrim's]] **{{SCP|Attack|70|link=y}} and {{SCP|Strength|70|link=y}} for [[Dharok the Wretched's equipment|Dharok's]] or [[Torag the Corrupted's equipment|Torag's]] **{{SCP|Attack|70|link=y}} for [[Guthan the Infested's equipment|Guthan's]] or [[Verac the Defiled's equipment|Verac's]] **{{SCP|Ranged|70|link=y}} for [[Karil the Tainted's equipment|Karil's]] |}
